miniapp.name: BaseVault
miniapp.subtitle: Create shared savings vaults with democratic fund management
miniapp.description: BaseVault enables groups to pool funds in collaborative savings vaults on Base. Create goals, contribute together, and vote democratically on proposals for fund releases. Perfect for group savings, shared expenses, and community treasuries with transparent on-chain governance.
miniapp.ogDescription: Create group savings vaults and vote democratically to release funds. Built on Base L2 for low fees and fast transactions.
